name: Charlie and Saul's Dungeon Crawl
description:
In this 8-bit style dungeon crawler, you play as a skull named Saul, fighting his way through the eerily cute hoards, to find loot, power-ups, power-downs, and the dungeon's 'limit'.  How long will you endure in the endless dungeons in this Halloween-themed, fire-packed, pun-infused nightmare?

Use peppers for an all around attack Destroy objects and containers Store and use items to help along the way

Fight bosses and level up the challenge
